text:
The description of the CoreDumpDirectory has a Linux-specific note.

The BSD-specific note should say something like:
<<To enable core-dumping of suid-executables on BSD-systems (such as FreeBSD), set the kern.sugid_coredump to 1.>>

This should go into all branches of the document tree, of course, not just the 2.2-HEAD, of course. Thanks!
Thanks. Patched in trunk, and applying to all other branches as well.
